required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of Coagulation Factors and Point-of-care Devices During Veno-venous ECMO Therapy
clinical_study.official_title: Analysis of the Activity of Different Coagulation Factors and Monitoring of Coagulation Using Point-of-care Devices During a Veno-venous ECMO Therapy

brief_summary.textblock: Hemorrhagic and thromboembolic complications are common in Veno-venous ECMO therapy. The aim of this study is to provide a detailed analysis of the activity of different coagulation factors and changes in functional coagulation measurements as in rotational thrombelastometry and multiple electrode aggregometry in the course of ECMO therapy.

primary_outcome.measure: Changes in the activity of coagulation factor II [%] during Veno-venous ECMO therapy
primary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-canulation and 6 hours, 1 day, 3 days, 7 days, 11 days, 15 days and 21 days after canulation
primary_outcome.description: Repeated assessment of the activity of coagulation factor II in % through standard coagulometric methods.

primary_outcome.description: Repeated assessment of the activity of coagulation factor V in % through standard coagulometric methods.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-canulation and 6 hours, 1 day, 3 days, 7 days, 11 days, 15 days and 21 days after canulation
secondary_outcome.description: Measurement of the vWF-Antigen

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in the vWF:Ristocetin-Cofaktor-Activity in % during Veno-venous ECMO therapy
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-canulation and 6 hours, 1 day, 3 days, 7 days, 11 days, 15 days and 21 days after canulation
secondary_outcome.description: Repeated assessments of the vWF:Ristocetin-Cofaktor-Activity [%]

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-canulation, 6 hours, 1 day, 2 days, 4 days, 7 days and 11 days after canulation
secondary_outcome.description: Changes in clotting time (CT) in the extrinsically activated assay (EXTEM) of rotational thrombelastometry (ROTEM), results were noted in seconds.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-canulation, 6 hours, 1 day, 2 days, 4 days, 7 days and 11 days after canulation
secondary_outcome.description: Changes in clotting time (CT) in the intrinsically activated assay (INTEM) of rotational thrombelastometry (ROTEM), results were noted in seconds.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-canulation, 6 hours, 1 day, 2 days, 4 days, 7 days and 11 days after canulation
secondary_outcome.description: Changes in clotting time (CT) in the extrinsically activated assay of rotational thrombelastometry (ROTEM) with the addition of Cytochalasin D to inhibit platelet aggregation (FIBTEM), results were noted in seconds.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-canulation, 6 hours, 1 day, 2 days, 4 days, 7 days and 11 days after canulation
secondary_outcome.description: Changes in clotting time (CT) in the intrinsically activated assay of rotational thrombelastometry (ROTEM) with the addition of heparin to eliminate heparin effects (HEPTEM), results were noted in seconds.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-canulation, 6 hours, 1 day, 2 days, 4 days, 7 days and 11 days after canulation
secondary_outcome.description: Changes in clot formation time (CFT) in the extrinsically activated assay (EXTEM) of rotational thrombelastometry (ROTEM), results were noted in seconds.

secondary_outcome.description: Changes in maximum clot firmness (MCF) in the intrinsically activated assay (INTEM) of rotational thrombelastometry (ROTEM), results were noted in millimeters.

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in arachidonic acid induced platelet aggregation assessed by multiple elcetrode aggregometry (MEA)(ASPItest)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-canulation, 6 hours, 1 day, 2 days, 4 days, 7 days and 11 days after canulation
secondary_outcome.description: Platelet aggregation after stimulation with arachidonic acid was recorded in aggregational units (AU).

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in adenosine diphosphate (ADP) induced platelet aggregation assessed by multiple elcetrode aggregometry (MEA)(ADPtest)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-canulation, 6 hours, 1 day, 2 days, 4 days, 7 days and 11 days after canulation
secondary_outcome.description: Platelet aggregation after stimulation with ADP was recorded in aggregational units (AU).

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in thrombin-receptor activating peptide (TRAP) induced platelet aggregation assessed by multiple elcetrode aggregometry (MEA)(TRAPtest)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-canulation, 6 hours, 1 day, 2 days, 4 days, 7 days and 11 days after canulation
secondary_outcome.description: Platelet aggregation after stimulation with TRAP was recorded in aggregational units (AU).

secondary_outcome.description: Measurement of Anti-Xa-Activity by chromogenic assay to determine heparin effect

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-canulation, 6 hours, 1 day, 2 days, 3 days, 4 days, 5, days, 6 days, 7 days, 10, days, 11 days 14 days, 17 days, 19 days and 21 days after canulation
secondary_outcome.description: Measurement of D-Dimers

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-canulation, 6 hours and daily from day 1- day 21after canulation
secondary_outcome.description: hemoglobin concentration in g/dl

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-canulation, 6 hours and daily from day 1- day 21after canulation
secondary_outcome.description: leucocyte count/µl

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Daily from day 1-21
secondary_outcome.description: Structured documentation of hemorrhagic complications

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Daily from day 1-21
secondary_outcome.description: Structured documentation of thrombotic complications

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Daily from day 1-21
secondary_outcome.description: Structured documentation of the state of the oxygenator including search for thrombotic material

intervention.description: Monitoring of coagulation using activity of coagulation factors, rotational thrombelastometry and multiple electrode aggregometry

study_pop.textblock: Patients with the need for Veno-venous ECMO therapy treated in a tertiary intensive care unit.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Need for a Veno-venous extracorporeal membrane oxygenation therapy
Exclusion Criteria:
- Known coagulation disorders
- Refusal to participate

overall_official.affiliation: Department of Anesthesiology, University Medical Center Goettingen
